Location Aware Products

Store Locator • Local Landing Pages • Promotions

Remove barriers and accelerate the path to purchase with relevant content that adapts based on your shoppers'locations.

- img -

Reach your customers, wherever they may be

Whether your customers are interacting with your brand through your website, store locator, email or social media, the Donde platform can help you deliver the content they desire with dynamic, location-based calls to action.

Easy integration across website and social media platforms
Wordpress, Squarespace, Shopify, Magento, Twitter, and Facebook
Automatic geolocation of your visitors
Dynamic calls to action
Combining location intelligence with business logic, adapt content to drive traffic.

Create a seamless experience

With brand matching configurations and designs within the Dónde platform, your shopper’s experience with your brand will remain continuous and uninterrupted.

Inform and adapt your marketing strategy

Through one central dashboard, view real time analytics on your locator, landing pages, and promotions.

Visit and location-specific analytics
Learn who is visiting, where they are from, what device they are using, and how they are interacting with your brand.
Slice and dice your data
Apply filters around geography, device type, and time to cut your data and uncover differences in behaviors and trends.
